findings.title: Unencrypted Database Connection
findings.evidence: Port 3306 open without TLS encryption. Database credentials transmitted in plaintext.

findings.title: SQL Injection Vulnerability
findings.evidence: User input not sanitized in authentication endpoint /api/login

findings.title: Remote Code Execution
findings.evidence: Deserialization vulnerability allows arbitrary code execution

findings.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
findings.evidence: Reflected XSS in search parameter allows script injection

findings.title: Insecure Direct Object Reference
findings.evidence: Users can access other users' data by changing ID parameter
